resources.string: When you need speed, %1$s is your droid. \nEnjoy seeing him blaze past his competitors in a blur!
Watch %1$s push all your opponents out of the way, he\'s a monster. \nOnce he picks a path, there\'s simply no stopping this juggernaut
Sometimes you need just the right mix of speed, agility, and strength to get the job done.\n If you need a balanced bot, you need %1$s.
Agility is key in short area quickness and explosiveness\n\n %1$s is consistently among the most agile players in his class.
He needs to work the most on his %1$s
